runs.comm: Tossed up outside off and he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off, quick single taken
this was a flatter delivery and he presses forward and defends
soft dismissal! It was a shorter delivery by the off spinner, Sibanda couldn't resist the pull, rocks back and pulls him straight to square leg, simple catch
Taylor goes for the sweep straightaway but the ball appears to clip his pad and go to first slip who fumbles, stifled appeal
goes for the sweep again, he connects well this time, Shafiul Islam dives at fine leg but his boot was touching the rope as he pulled it back, third umpire takes a look
the reverse sweep this time and he ends up placing it straight to cover, didn't quite come off as expected
this was a touch too wide outside off and full too, he goes for the drive and misses
fullish delivery outside off again and he safely leaves it alone
crashed! Shafiul gets predictable with his length, too full and wide too, Masakadza gets down and bashes it past cover, the fielders could do nothing
more intent on this one! Masakadza made room and chipped down the track and carved it over cover, raw power
Shafiul adjusts his line and angles it towards middle and leg, the ball clips the pads as he tries to flick, stifled appeal
slower ball and he tucks it in front of mid-on and sets off
Taylor clears the infield! This was pitched up outside off and he steps forward and lofts through the line to long-off
brings out the reverse sweep and he places it better than Taylor, past short third man, fielder chases and pulls it back
slower through the air and he works it towards midwicket
Taylor's not having a good day with the reverse sweep, this was angled towards middle and leg, looked like it clipped the edge and rolled to the on side
down the track and he works it over square leg for a couple
swept hard but straight to short square leg
uses his feet and forces it straight to midwicket
the sweep again and he places it just wide of short fine leg
this was fired flatter and he stays back and pulls to midwicket
swept towards short fine leg and Tamim fumbles and that allows the single
Taylor continues to sweep, hammers it down to deep square leg
flatter delivery and down the leg side and Masakadza fails to clip that away, the ball clips his pad
lovely drive! Tossed up outside off, Masakadza makes room and places it in the gap at cover, off the front foot
nearly had himself in a tangle, down the track, checks the shot and gets an outside edge to short third man
dropped short and he rocks back and pulls to deep square leg
tossed up and he clips it to the on side
this was dropped short and he rocked back and pulled it over square leg, fielder in the deep chased but gave up
tries to sweep but the ball clips the pads and rolls away
stays back and placed towards point
another attempted sweep and the ball hits his hip probably just outside off, loud appeal
makes room this time, the bowler follows him and he places it straight to cover
he gets the sweep right this time, tossed up down leg, on his knee and he scoops it over short fine leg
goes over the off side this time, tossed up and he chips down the track and lofts it over cover
this one skids through and hits the pads
punches it firmly towards mid-on and calls quickly for the single
chips down the track and he controls the shot, lofts it over mid-off
tossed up down the leg side and he sweeps uppishly to square leg
gives it more air and he comes well forward and clips it towards midwicket
this one sneaked past everything! Flatter delivery, skidded, he tries to work it away and the ball beats the batsman and keeper and rolls to third man
tries the reverse sweep and the ball clips the pads and rolls to the on side
this was a touch short and wide outside off and punched straight to point
was that Brendan Taylor or AB de Villiers! Amazing! He gets down on his knee and sweeps a seamer over long leg for six, great improvisation
slower delivery and he gets forward and pushes it towards point
works it away towards midwicket for a single
another audacious shot! Taylor shuffles across, knew where Sajidul was going to land it, he picks it from outside off and scoops it over short fine leg, now a fielder goes back
this was drifting down the leg side and wide called
fuller delivery outside the off stump and he works it towards mid-on
tossed up outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
he rocks back and he cuts it hard past point
Bangladesh will be relieved that Taylor's gone, tossed up and Taylor used his feet, chipped down the track and he checks the loft, Tamim takes it easily well in front of the long-off rope
quicker delivery and driven straight to cover
fires that quicker and he tries to clip that and the ball clips his pad and rolls away
quick single! Pushes it towards mid-off and a direct hit and it would have been curtains for Masakadza
fires that down the leg side, tries to work it away
stays back and he punches it down to mid-on
flatter delivery and he works it away towards midwicket
bowls that fuller and he comes down the track and drives hard to long-off
streaky! This was bowled flatter and he went for the pull a bit too early, gets an inside edge that sneaks past the leg stump and the keeper, Tamim chases at fine leg and pulls it back
goes for the slog and the ball nearly knocks down the off stump
goes back at the crease and punches it down to long-off
drops it short and he goes back at the crease and pulls it to deep midwicket
down the track and he pushes a full toss to long-off
down on his knee and swept towards fine leg
stays back at the crease and uppishly clips it towards midwicket
flatter delivery and clipped towards long-on
stops at the crease and bowls it slower, Williams tries to cut but misses

clever bowling! The ball before Mahmudullah tossed it up slowly, this time he fired it flat and quick, Williams was down the track, yorked himself and was well out of his crease when Mushfiqur whipped off the bails
Good start for Raza! This was dropped too short, Raza stayed back, pulled it along the ground to deep square leg
down the track and chipped just wide of the bowler, down to long-off
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
quicker delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
slogged! Gazi tosses it up and Masakadza sizes himself up for the slog sweep, on his knee and clears deep midwicket
pushes it down to long-on
down the leg side and he gets some bat on it
drifts down the leg side and clipped towards square leg, Raza was off in a flash, his partner hesitated
pushes this one back to the bowler
towards the pads and he clips it to the on side
down the track and he slogs a full toss to deep square leg
goes back and he punches it towards cover
down the leg side and he fails to put it away
fires that quicker and he can only place it towards mid-on
confident appeal for a lbw, Masakadza shuffled across and tried to sweep, the umpire thought it was missing leg
full toss and he punches it wide of cover
makes room and he drives him hard down to long-off
bowls that fuller and he clips it wide of midwicket to bring up his fifty
full on the pads and clipped away down to deep square leg
shorter delivery and slower, Raza made a lot of room and tried to slice that over the off side and misses
a bouncer but a quicker one, Raza goes for the pull but misses

Shakib does the juggling act and manages to hang on! Fuller delivery on middle and leg and Raza stays at the crease and heaves it to wide long-on, Shakib has it covered, fumbles and the ball pops out, he manages to pluck it one-handed in the second attempt, only just
tossed up and he sweeps, the ball's in the air and one bounce to deep square leg
tossed up outside off and he pushes it towards long-off and they take the first one hard
drives a full delivery to wide long-off and the fielder does well to slide and cut it off
he pays for the low full toss, Waller comes forward, stays at the crease and slogs it to deep midwicket
sweeps and it's in the air and down to deep square leg
fires that flat and down the leg side
this was full outside off and he digs it out to point, 13 off this over
stays back and clips it towards wide long-on, Bangladesh are rushing through the overs here
this was flatter, Waller made room and ended up chopping it back to the bowler
steers it just wide of point, Sajidul was a bit slow cutting that off at the deep and that allows a second run
this was dropped short and Waller stayed back and flat batted it wide of long-off, picked the big gap well
tries to steer it past point but the fielder slides and cuts it off
on the pads and clipped towards mid-on
down the leg side and the ball clips the pads and rolls to the leg side
tries to make room but Shakib fires that full and flat outside off and he misses
Shakib had changed to over the wicket, bowled that flatter and shorter, Masakadza used the crease and tried hoicking it over deep midwicket, Gazi takes the skier
flatter delivery and he lofts it down to long-on, the fielder pulls out of the catch
down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
lovely shot! Makes a bit of room and he carves it over extra cover
shuffles across and works it away wide of square leg for a couple, good running
drives just wide of long-on and they pick up two again
makes room, clears the back leg and he chips it towards long-off
gives it more air, gets on his knee and tries to slog him but he mistimes it to the leg side
starts off with a dot ball, slower ball and fuller and he can only hammer it back to the bowler
fullish in length outside and driven just wide of cover
Waller goes for the lap shot and it doesn't come off at all! Shuffles well across and the ball clips his pads, Waller loses his balance
good improvisation this time, outside off and though he was trying to hammer it over the on side, he adjusts and hammers it wide of point
makes room and he swings and misses, the ball misses the leg stump, they can't steal a byr
finishes with a six! Ruins what was shaping to be a good over for Bangladesh, slower ball but it was pitched up, Waller lofts through the line and just clears deep midwicket
